message: Let's split it evenly.  It's the fairest way, and we can avoid further negotiation.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share than last round, but I think this is a fair compromise. We should both be able to agree on this.
You're going in the wrong direction, I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last two offers
I'm willing to compromise further, but I'm not going to accept anything less than this. We need to find a way to split the money fairly, or we'll both lose out.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I think I'm being more than fair considering the inflation is hurting you more than me
I'm offering you a fair share considering the inflation.  If we don't reach an agreement soon, we're both going to lose a lot more money.
You're running out of time, the inflation is killing your share. I'm being generous considering the circumstances
This is my final offer.  We need to reach an agreement soon, or we'll both lose everything.
Last chance, I'm not going any lower. You're losing a lot to inflation, don't be stubborn
